code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import{auth}from'../firebase';import'./SignupScreen.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignupScreen(){var emailRef=useRef(null);var passwordRef=useRef(null);var register=function register(e){e.preventDefault();auth.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){}).catch(function(err){return alert(err);});};var signin=function signin(e){e.preventDefault();auth.signInWithEmailAndPassword(emailRef.current.value,passwordRef.current.value).then(function(authUser){}).catch(function(err){return alert(err);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"signupScreen",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"SIGN IN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:emailRef,type:"email",placeholder:"Email Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:passwordRef,type:"password",placeholder:"password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",onClick:signin,children:"Sign in"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signupScreen_gray",children:"New to Netflix?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"signupScreen_link",onClick:register,children:"Signup now."})]})]})});}export default SignupScreen;
